oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Special report by the Superintendent
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carmichael, Benjamin E.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Special report submitted by the superintendent of Chattanooga public schools at a meetingo f the Chattanooga Board of Education on the subject of rumors related to closure and integration of Lookout Junior High School located in the St. Elmo neighborhood and Chattanooga, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
